//: Flesh forest is a massive area full of crimson horrors, while its terrain is very harsh and will try to prevent you from getting further to the depths.
This is the center part of the forest. All crimson horrors will appear MORE often at this area.

From this point, the flesh's internal structure is randomized: gaps, deadends and deathtraps are purely made with RNG, but there are paths which will lead you to the proper directions. The deeper the structure, the denser it becomes.
The pathways are larger, incase of RNG messing it up.
